title: Les Beaux souvenirs
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Jean Dansereau and Francis Maikiewiez
brief_description: A middle-class wife leaves her husband with two young daughters. Through a series of occasional flash-backs, a contrast is made between the seemingly happy family relationship when the girls were young and the shattered threesome in later years. Starring Monique Spaziani, Julie Vincent and Paul Herbert.
